# `uv pip compile <(echo foobar)` reports "file not found", but it should work

---

_Issue opened by @BurntSushi on 2024-05-31 14:17_

Example:

```
$ uv-0.1.24 pip compile <(echo example)
Resolved 2 packages in 527ms
# This file was autogenerated by uv via the following command:
#    uv pip compile /proc/self/fd/11
example==0.1.0
six==1.16.0
    # via example
$ uv pip compile <(echo example)
error: File not found: `/proc/self/fd/11
```

`git bisect` suggests this was introduced in https://github.com/astral-sh/uv/commit/081f20c53ef6849c816cbe12e5dcf4bb7de575e1.

---
